scripts.docker-push: docker build -t fraserthompson/doctorpricerscrapers . && docker push fraserthompson/doctorpricerscrapers
scripts.restore-dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.extra.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f docker-compose.yml run restore
scripts.backup-dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.extra.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f docker-compose.yml run backup
scripts.dbshell: docker-compose exec django python manage.py dbshell
scripts.shell: docker-compose exec django python manage.py shell
